availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry W. Tuttle (Wayne County, KY, mechanic)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, mechanic. Connecticut native. Married to Courtney Metcalf in Wayne County on October, 14, 1836. Master mechanic in Wayne County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Monticello, p. 384.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, p. 10.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, District 1, p. 33B.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, File # 000591550, Wayne County, October 14, 1836.
